title: Mr. Coffee® Pump Espresso Maker - ECMP50-RB -  How to Brew
description: Make espresso, cappuccino and lattes like a true barista. The Mr. Coffee® Café Espresso uses a 15-bar pump system that brews rich, creme-topped espresso with impressive results and milk froth for creamy cappuccinos and lattes.
